metadata.title: USN-2280-1 -- MiniUPnPc vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that MiniUPnPc incorrectly handled certain buffer lengths. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using MiniUPnPc to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2280-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libminiupnpc-dev - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.1 libminiupnpc8 - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.1 miniupnpc - 1.6-3ubuntu2.14.04.1 No subscription required
